newsitem.title: UK: UK shares pare losses to end near day's best level.
newsitem.headline: UK shares pare losses to end near day's best level.

text.p: UK's leading share index shed 1.5 percent on Tuesday as Wall Street's vicious decline unnerved investors.

And while the Dow recovered some ground, helping the FTSE 100 share index pare its losses at the end of the day, investors remained jittery about a further increase in U.S. interest rates and about the prospects for corporate earnings.
The UK's benchmark index finished 64.8 points lower at 4,248.1, the day's best level. The index fell as low as 4,200.5 initially.
